election_record.label: New York 1803 State Senate, Eastern District

overview.note: Some sources list John Taylor as "John Tayler" and Thomas Tredwell as "Thomas Tredwell."

The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 6926 votes for John Taylor, 6932 votes for John Woodworth, 6882 votes for Edward Savage, 6825 votes for Thomas Treadwell, 6656 votes for Simon Veeder, 4671 votes for Stephen Lush, 4635 votes for Ebenezer Clark, 4598 votes for Daniel Paris, and 4512 votes for William Bailey.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: William Bailey received 1 vote as William Bally.
The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY), The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 1358 votes for Stephen Lush and 1327 votes for William Bailey.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 907 votes for John Woodworth.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The Abany Gazette, Centinel, Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), and Commercial Advertiser list 223 votes for Stephen Lush.
The Centinel and the Commercial Advertiser list 202 votes for William Bailey, 201 votes for Ebenezer Clark, 125 votes for John Woodworth, and 122 votes for Thomas Tredwell.
The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 122 votes for Thomas Tredwell.

sub_unit.name: Two
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) and The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 53 votes for Stephen Lush.

sub_unit.name: Two
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 65 votes for William Bailey.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: Ebenezer Clark received 1 vote as Ebenezer Clack.
William Bailey received 1 vote as William Bail and 1 vote as William Banly.
Daniel Paris received 1 vote as Daniel Baris.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 1396 votes for John Woodworth.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 635 votes for Daniel Paris.

sub_unit.name: Mayfield
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 69 votes for John Woodworth.

sub_unit.name: Minden
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 109 votes for Simon Veeder.

sub_unit.name: Palatine
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 204 votes for Simon Veeder.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 1139 votes for Stephen Lush, 1128 votes for Daniel Paris, and 1131 votes for William Bailey.
The Farmer's Register lists 1135 votes for Moses Vail and 1128 votes for Daniel Paris.
Simon Veeder received 1 vote as Simeon Veeder, Jun.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) and The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 1268 votes for Edward Savage and 349 votes for Moses Vail.

sub_unit.name: Halfmoon
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 90 votes for Ebenezer Clark.

sub_unit.name: Milton
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 107 votes for Edward Savage and 19 votes for Moses Vail.

sub_unit.name: Northumberland
sub_unit.note: Simon Veeder received 3 votes as Samuel Vader.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Simon Veeder received 2 votes as Samuel Veeder and 1 vote as Simeon Vicar.

The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 1720 votes for John Taylor, 1675 votes for Edward Savage, 1673 votes for Simon Veeder, 844 votes for Ebenezer Clark, and 745 votes for William Bailey.
The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) and The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 1673 votes for Simon Veeder.

The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) and The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 787 votes for Moses Vail, 766 votes for Daniel Paris, 844 votes for Ebenezer Clark, and 757 votes for William Bailey.
The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) and the American Citizen (New York, NY) list 1673 votes for Simon Veeder and 844 votes for Ebenezer Clark.
The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) and the American Citizen (New York, NY) list 849 votes for Stephen Lush, 760 votes for Daniel Paris, and 727 votes for William Bailey.

sub_unit.name: Argyle
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 81 votes for Ebenezer Clark.

sub_unit.name: Hampton
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 33 votes for John Woodworth and 80 votes for Ebenezer Clark.

sub_unit.name: Salem
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 154 votes for Thomas Treadwell.

election_record.reference: The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). May 11, 1803.
